p: Compounds 256– 257 were investigated for their inhibitory activities against the LPS-activated production of NO in RAW264.7 cells using the Griess assay with indomethacin as a positive control (IC 50 = 37.5 ± 1.6 μM). The effects of compounds on cell proliferation/viability were determined using MTT method, and none of the test compounds exhibited cytotoxicity at their effective concentrations. Compounds 256 and 257 showed strong inhibitory effects on the production of NO, with IC 50 values of 0.78 ± 0.06 and 1.26 ± 0.11 μM, respectively [ 84].
